member.summary: Gets whether the WinForms site should display a caption control for the control add-in. true will display a caption control; false will omit the caption control and use available space for the control add-in's WinForms control and the control add-in is responsible for displaying the control's caption itself.

member.summary: Finalizes an instance of the class.

member.summary: Implements the method.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Dynamics.Framework.UI.Extensibility.WinForms.WinFormsControlAddInBase.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Dispose method called when the object is disposed.
member.remarks: Dispose(bool disposing) executes in two distinct scenarios. If disposing equals true, the method has been called directly or indirectly by a user's code. Managed and unmanaged resources can be disposed. If disposing equals false, the method has been called by the runtime from inside the finalizer and you should not reference other objects. Only unmanaged resources can be disposed.
member.param: Set to true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.
